name: Summer Breeze Crochet Dress
description:
These beautiful handmade Crochet Dresses are made from 100% soft Cotton. Crochet lace is perfect for warm climates, or as a layering piece in cooler locales.
The colour is a natural off white. The square neck line opens with shell buttons on the shoulders for easy dressing. This is a very special dress for the little gypsy girl in your life. The perfect dress for beach summer holiday adventures. 
*singlet under slip not included

name: Choobe Short - Aztec
description:
These are a super fun casual short, that doubles as a boardie.
They have a functioning draw string at the front for an adjustable waist. With soft elastic at the back, along with a back pocket to keep treasures in. This old skool cut is one of our most popular pieces. 
The sizing is generous on these shorts.

These Choobe shorts are made from durable light weight cotton fabric.

name: Aloha Jumpsuit White
description:
The one-piece that your daughter will wear for seasons. When it become too small as a one piece, they can be worn as pants! 
These roomy jumpsuits are perfect for holiday lounging. With tie shoulder straps, stretchy shirred elastic top and ankles, they are adjustable to many different shapes and sizes. Depending on the size you buy, they can be worn long or short - anywhere between the knee or ankle. They are typically a 3/4 length. 
Made from super soft Crinkled rayon. You'll never iron them!


I am reordering this style in white only. If you would like to pre-order a white in a size 1,2,4,6,8,or10 please contact me via email.        kate@bandikoot.com.au

name: Sleeveless Aztec Shirt
description:
Sleeveless collared shirt made from the softest light-weight Rayon.
Something special for your little guy.
This is one of my favourite pieces this summer. 
The sleeves on this shirt have been left as raw. 
  
*These beauties will be restocked in January : ))

name: Purple Floral Lily Dress
description:
This beautiful prairie style dress is fun and practical. 
Made from adorable 100% cotton floral repurposed vintage  fabric.
With frills for sun protection. The neck is elasticated and has a drawstring that will keep it from falling off her shoulders.

Limited!! Only 4 dresses made in this fabric.

This garment is made from up-cycled vintage 100% cotton fabric.
As most pieces are cut from printed fabrics with large picture/floral scenes all garments end up looking slightly different, with different details in different positions. No two garments are ever the same. Your piece will be a precious one off.
Please note the piece you buy may look slightly different to the one in these pictures.

name: Playsuit - Summer Time
description:
Beautiful lightweight Cotton onesie.
Adjustable shoulders (metal). Generous sizing.
Elastic waist with added drawstring waist tie.
Pockets for treasures. Modest short length
Super soft and cute as pie!!

name: Navy Striped Raglan Tee
description:
Add some colour and fun to their wardrobe this summer.
Practical light-weight and super-soft rayon jersey. Classic retro raglan sleeve t-shirt. Available in 4 fun summer striped colours.

name: Sgt. Pepper Pippy
description:
Scalloped casual short. With satin piping and soft elastic waist.
Great for over nappies and toilet training.
Kids love these comfy shorts. Super cool in the hot weather!!

This garment is made from up-cycled vintage poly/cotton fabric.
As most pieces are cut from printed fabrics with large picture/floral scenes all garments end up looking slightly different, with different details in different positions. No two garments are ever the same. Your piece will be a precious one off.

name: Cherokee Poncho - Bright Pink
description: Our soft knitted Ponchos are everyones favourite this season. With its tasselled fringing and plaited adjustable neck tie. Its a must have for every little indian's wardrobe. And it works on every body shape. Made from Rayon.

name: Sleeveless Shirt Dress _ Polkadot
description:
These Australian summer inspired beauties are sleeveless with raw edges around the arm only. Great for layering with leggings and jackets.
The dress has two neat breast pockets for treasures . It buttons all the way down the front and can be worn open as a jacket or cape. Super easy dress for a hot summer, waist ties are sewn in for easy wear. 
Made from 100% super soft Rayon.

name: Leopard Print Harem Pants
description:
These comfy little numbers are made from super soft Rayon.
An elastic waist. The draw string ankle allow them to be worn big
at the ankle or small under the knee. You'll get a few seasons out of them this way. 
One of our most popular pieces!!

description:

name: Cable Knit Vest
description:
This beautiful Vest is super soft, fluffy and not itchy at all.
Made from acrylic Mohair it is perfect for temperate winters or cold summer nights.
A must have for every little gentleman!!

name: Winter Shirt Dress
description:
Beautiful classic cut girls Shirt Dress. Great for layering with leggings and long sleeves.
The dress buttons all the way down the front. Can be worn open as a jacket/cape. Long sleeves with cuffs can be rolled in warmer weather and  ties at waist are attached for easy wear. The dress also has two neat breast pockets.

The Paisley Print is 100% super soft rayon.
The Blue Floral is 100% cotton.

name: Leggings
description:
A great loose fitting legging with generous length for boys and girls.
The extra length means you can go down a size if your little cherub has an extra small waist. 
Bells and sunny are both 3 1/2 and are wearing the size 4
Baby Bodhi is 3mths old and wearing the green/brown 000 and the pink/blue 00

name: BandiKoot Cap
description:
Super cute babies cap, lined with a super soft woven cotton. The old skool flap at the back can be folded down to keep the sun of your little ones neck
The navy and eggplant are made in a soft cotton drill and camouflage is ripstop. These caps are a small fit.

Size 1 is recommended for ages 6mths  - 12mths

Size 2 is recommended for ages 1 - 2 1/2yrs

**Free Shipping in Australia**

name: Cable Knit Beanie
description:
This cute little cable knit beanie is made from super soft acrylic wool. Making it not too hot or itchy.
In three great winter colours for you to choose from.

One size fits all.

name: Striped V-Neck in maroon and navy
description:
Warning this jumper is NOT itchy!
This is the yummiest super soft knit!! You'll be wishing you could get one for yourself, i know i was!
A deep V-neck, in 3 different fun unisex palettes of stripes. Super fun!

Made from 100% acrylic mohair. In 3 different sizes. 
The 2 is sized small, more like a 1 and the 4/5 and 6/7 are sized normally. Sorry about this hick-up : ))
